title: Missing Champion Capsule
body: I leveled up from 35 to 36 and didn't receive a champion capsule. I then received later today but it did not appear in my loot. I restarted my client multiple times but it still did not appear. I need help with this issue.

replies.body: Heya, I looked into this and do see that it was missing from your inventory.  I gave your account a boop to nudge it along, so everything should be okay now!
Hi, Porocles. The same thing happened to me on my level up from 39 to 40. Could you do the same for me? or should I submit a separate ticket? Thanks!
Thank you, I received my capsule and everything is fine now.

this happened to me from 30>31 and it's rather dissapointing that no fix has been found other than hoping someone gives my account a boop ><

Edit: mine was weirder. I apparently hit 31 a few days ago and after a win today it announced it to me and the loot tab showed loot but then there was nothing there when I checked.
